root.name: Chaos on Deponia
root.description: OverviewChaos on Deponia picks up immediately where the first game left off. After the events of the first game, Rufus tries to hitch a ride to Elysium with Goal and Cletus, but instead damages their transport and sends the three of them plummeting back down to Deponia.Unfortunately, the fall causes further damage to Goal’s brain implant, which leads to her consciousness fragmenting into three segments. Rufus must find a way to fix Goal, save Deponia by thwarting Cletus and the Organon’s plans, and make it clear that Deponia is inhabited.System RequirementsPCMinimumOS: Windows XPProcessor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceSound: DirectX compatibleRecommendedOS: Windows Vista/7/8Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)Memory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceSound: DirectX compatibleMacMinimumOS: Lion (10.7)Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core) IntelMemory: 2 GB RAMHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceRecommendedOS: Lion (10.7)Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core) IntelMemory: 2 GB RAMHard Drive: 5 GB HD space
